reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 407/97: APPOINTMENT OF ARBITRATORS AND CONCILIATION OFFICERS
reg_info.reg_name_text: APPOINTMENT OF ARBITRATORS AND CONCILIATION OFFICERS

content.content: 1. A conciliation officer described in section 49 of the Act shall be appointed by the Minister.  O. Reg. 407/97, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A conciliation officer described in section 49 of the Act shall be appointed by the Minister.  O. Reg. 407/97, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) For the purpose of subsection 53 (3) of the Act, the parties shall jointly appoint a single arbitrator.  O. Reg. 407/97, s. 2 (1). (2) If there is a failure to jointly appoint a single arbitrator, the Minister, upon request of either party, may appoint the arbitrator, and any person so appointed by the Minister shall be deemed to have been appointed in accordance with the collective agreement.  O. Reg. 407/97, s. 2 (2).  Français
content.raw_html:
2. (1) For the purpose of subsection 53 (3) of the Act, the parties shall jointly appoint a single arbitrator.  O. Reg. 407/97, s. 2 (1).

(2) If there is a failure to jointly appoint a single arbitrator, the Minister, upon request of either party, may appoint the arbitrator, and any person so appointed by the Minister shall be deemed to have been appointed in accordance with the collective agreement.  O. Reg. 407/97, s. 2 (2).
